dl.dd: For template generated elements, this attribute may optionally be placed on the root node (the element with the template.XULAttr("datasources") attribute) to refer to a template that exists elsewhere in the XUL code. This template attribute should be set to the template.XULAttr("id") of the template.XULElem("template") element. This might be used to share a single template between multiple trees or menus. If this attribute is not specified, there should be a template element directly inside the node.
